author: Andrew Hall
content:
Phil, that was the second GRAYBACK. This is the one found near Okinawa:

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/USS_Grayback_(SS-208)

author: Phil
content:
Really?

Do the name ships the same name?

Name:
USS Grayback
Ordered:
10 March 1951
Builder:
Mare Island Naval Shipyard
Laid down:
1 July 1954
Launched:
2 July 1957

author: Andy Hall
content: Great project, but odd that they use a German U-Boat on the project emblem.

author: Jean-Pierre Declemy
content: 21.5K tons of shipping sunk would be a lot easier to achieve nowadays.
